attributes.action: Reimburse Vehicle Drivers Whom are paying Road Tax and Council Tax to the Upkeep of Roads, Motorways, Dual carriages whom are being discriminated against.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Transport Policies are now being enforced against Vehicle Drivers, whom do not have the latest ECO vehicle or drivers whom travel alone.
Being penalised, not able to use certain lanes on motorways or town driving.
They Should be reimbursed road tax and the appropiate council tax they pay for this privelege.
This is Unfair Enough is Enough, Vote against it or suffer more in the future.
